# VisualShaderNodeVectorLen

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeVectorBase](VisualShaderNodeVectorBase.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Returns the length of a [Vector3](Vector3.md) within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translated to ``length(p0)`` in the shader language.
